title: Targeted for Murder
description: MOUNTAIN PURSUIT With his dying breath, Hadley Mason's fatally shot father reveals he's a CIA agentâ€¦and a bounty has been placed on both their heads. Heeding his urgent warning to disappear and trust no one, Hadley flees into the Oregon wilderness, but she can't shake the string of hired killers on her trail. So when a fearless and too-handsome wilderness guide comes to her rescue, Hadley has no choice but to put her life in Cooper Wilde's hands. The former Green Beret vows to protect her, but beyond steep gorges and treacherous terrain, a ruthless man will stop at nothing to see her dead.
author: Elizabeth Goddard
